scripts.change-tauri: switch.exe . tauri on chrome_extension off web off
scripts.change-githubPages: switch.exe . tauri off chrome_extension off web on
scripts.change-chrome-extension: switch.exe . tauri off chrome_extension on web on
scripts.build: npm run change-tauri && tsc && vite build
scripts.githubPages: npm run change-githubPages && tsc && vite build --outDir docs --base="./" && npm run change-tauri
scripts.chrome-extension: npm run change-chrome-extension && tsc && vite build && npm run change-tauri
